title: [GAMEPLAY] Hextech Annie hp bar disappears when going invulnerable
body:
Anytime a person using the hextech annie skin goes invulnerable their hp bar completely disappears instead of going golden. 
To recreate:
1. Annie uses Zhonya's, or gets hit by any other invulnerability spell (kindred r, bard r)

It is extremely hard to realize where an Annie is in a teamfight when her hp bar just completely disappears making it hard to manage a teamfight around an invulnerable annie

replies.body: Hey NoXhistory, thanks for the report! Looks like the team is aware of the issue and are working on a fix. ^-^ Seems her health bar is (for some reason) different than the others, which is what's causing the issue. D:
